plot: An old astronomer has been transfixed by a star for a long time. He had but one thought: to travel to it, to declare his love for it! But how? Seeing children playing, with soap bubbles gives him an idea...simple but ingenious!
title: Voyage autour d'une étoile
plot_es: An old astronomer has been transfixed by a star for a long time. He had but one thought: to travel to it, to declare his love for it! But how? Seeing children playing, with soap bubbles gives him an idea...simple but ingenious!
